    public class HvDialogBox
extends com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.DialogBox
    The Class HuitDialogBox represents a dialog box for generic use. This is a subclass class extended from com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.DialogBox. It includes the following panels: a formPanel - content panel a buttonPanel - action button panel including leftButtonPanel and rightButtonPanel
